name: places/ChIJC2V-7ApZwokR4Alz0EMMRz8
adrFormatAddress: 372 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10010-5614, USA

originalText.text: Hollywood Salon is a popular hair salon in the neighborhood on Second Avenue frequented by locals and by young children. I was searching for a good salon at rock bottom prices. If I had oodles of money or a sugar daddy I could go to Madison Avenue. A friend had suggested a lady in Chinatown who spoke no English and charged nine dollars. I was intrigued but wondered how my hair would look when I left? Kojak? Would I need an interpreter? I looked on Yelp and started calling places. Hollywood Salon charged $40 and is a cash only establishment. The staff is from Eastern Europe. A young lady, Alla.  washed my hair nicely and then Irene, an older lady cut my hair. She understood what a blunt cut was and got to work. Snip snip. Lo and behold, my new haircut gave my hair bounce. I was happy. I will return.

She understood what a blunt cut was and got to work. Snip snip. Lo and behold, my new haircut gave my hair bounce. I was happy. I will return.

originalText.text: My hair color and cut was phenomenal. I had grown out roots and washed out color.  I got a stylish cut and and glorious color. The salon’s owner Irena and staff were very friendly and welcoming. I was impressed at how gracious they were to clients and walk ins. Great experience. Totally recommend

text.text: My hair color and cut was phenomenal. I had grown out roots and washed out color.  I got a stylish cut and and glorious color. The salon’s owner Irena and staff were very friendly and welcoming. I was impressed at how gracious they were to clients and walk ins. Great experience. Totally recommend

originalText.text:
I don't usually write many reviews but I have had such a good experience with Hollywood salon and they don't have many recent reviews that I wanted to spread the word.

I have been coming here for 4 years to get a haircut and blowout and have always been very happy with the results. What is amazing is the price-which is pretty hard to get in Manhattan! I usually make an appointment but have been able to do walk-ins as well.

Recently, during a haircut I mentioned getting my hair colored, and Nadia was so helpful and telling me what would look good that I made an appointment for the next week for a balayage. I will admit that I was a bit anxious as I had never gotten my hair colored before and I didn't see many pictures or reviews here. I also have fine black Asian hair! However, Nadia was amazing- I showed her a picture of how I wanted my hair to look and she was very confident she could do it.

I am very happy with the end result! My example picture had more subtle dark brown highlights, but my hair ended up with a slightly lighter brown which I actually like better as there is more contrast with my black hair.

In the pictures it looks a bit blonde but that is only due to the lighting. They gave me a blowout and I love the curls!

All in all it took about 2.5 hours and cost $175 which is a GREAT price for nyc. I would definitely come back! Thanks!

originalText.text: It was my first time at the Hollywood salon. They are absolutely great! All of them were so friendly. I got my haircut exactly how I wanted. With excellent prices! 100% recommended! Will be a regular here!

text.text: It was my first time at the Hollywood salon. They are absolutely great! All of them were so friendly. I got my haircut exactly how I wanted. With excellent prices! 100% recommended! Will be a regular here!

originalText.text: I've been to too many crazy expensive salons in NYC only to NEVER get the simple haircut I was requesting. I go here one time and boom... Perfect haircut and it was so much less expensive... This will be my salon from now on.
